version_description: Thank you for all the feedback on the first version! In this version we have been listening and done some small fixes based on your feedback!

- Bug fix for users not able to complete overwintering tasks and repotting tasks
- Bug fix for watering schedule when moving from winter to spring season

Last version:
- Spring is on its way, and we've added new overwintering actions to help you prepare your plants for the coming season, including actions and instructions for seasonal pruning
- Updated water algorithm for plants that has not been repotted

We’ve listened to your feedback and updated the Todo View:
- Easier to get an overview and handle many tasks
- Sort tasks based on plant, site or type of tasks
- Every task now shows the plant name, a picture of the plant and it´s site
- Easier to complete a lot of tasks at the same time with one ”Complete all”-button

If you find any problems just send us an email at contact@getplanta.com

In this version we corrected a problem with today's tasks sometimes being scheduled for tomorrow because of time zone issues

If you find any problems just send us an email at contact@getplanta.com
We have fixed some annoying bugs in this version to celebrate that spring is finally here!

The largest update in the history of Planta is finally here!

- Herbs
- Most common vegetables like Tomato, Chili, Lettuce 
- Outdoor support (for balcony and potted outdoor plants)
- Possibility to add new plants to the database (for advanced users only)
- Is this plant toxic to me or my pet? (see toxic info on the plant detail page)
- Improved water-algorithm for extreme summer temperatures

The largest update in the history of Planta is finally here!
- Herbs
- Most common vegetables like Tomato, Chili, Lettuce 
- Outdoor support (for balcony and potted outdoor plants)
- Possibility to add new plants to the database (for advanced users only)
- Is this plant toxic to me or my pet? (see toxic info on the plant detail page)
- Improved water-algorithm for extreme summer temperatures

The largest update in the history of Planta is finally here!
- Herbs

- Is this plant toxic to me or my pet? (see toxic info on the plant detail page)

The largest update in the history of Planta is finally here!
- Herbs
- Most common vegetables like Tomato, Chili, Lettuce 
- Outdoor support (for balcony and potted outdoor plants)
- Possibility to add new plants to the database (for advanced users only)
- Is this plant toxic to me or my pet? (see toxic info on the plant detail page)
- Improved water-algorithm for extreme summer temperatures

- Support for Air Plants
- Wishlist, a place to save your favorite plants
- Graveyard, if sadly one of your plants die they'll be saved in the plant graveyard
- Improved watering algorithm

- Plant temperatures have been updated for more accurate indoor/outdoor recommendations
- Stability fixes
- With this version it will be faster for the Planta team to add requested plants

Fixed crash when adding plants!

Previous Version:
- Plant temperatures have been updated for more accurate indoor/outdoor recommendations
- Stability fixes
- With this version it will be faster for the Planta team to add requested plants

Snooze tasks
If you get a reminder to water but it's not time yet you can now snooze the task 2 days by tapping the X-button on each task

Improved plant identification 
Better accuracy and Planta can now identify more species. Also if the plant is not yet in the Planta database you'll have the option to request the plant to be added.

- Advanced users can now set their own custom watering and fertilizing schedule: To turn this on, go to the specific plant > Edit (in top right corner) > Custom care
- Support for Dark Mode
- Fixed bug when using Planta with bad internet connection

- The plant detail view has been redesigned

- We've added water and fertilizer charts to all plants in the database so you can see how their demand change throughout the year

- New instructions and articles to help you care for your plants

Now possible to turn off misting notifications if you feel they are too annoying. Also an updated design on the search page.

Important bug fixes

Previous version:
Now possible to turn off misting notifications if you feel they are too annoying. Also an updated design on the search page.
Bug fixes

A lot!
- Light meter!
Not sure how intense the light is in your room, and if your plant is really suitable there? The light meter will automatically let you know!

- Custom tasks
Did you give your plant water outside of the schedule? We made it super easy to track this with a big + button on each plant

- Pictures
One of the best things about plants is that they grow! Right? And when they do, snap a picture, upload it to Planta and build a diary of your plants growth progress

-Updated history design
Past endeavors should be visible! We changed the design of your plants history to easier get a grasp of what you’ve done or browse through your added pictures. 

- Improvements on the care algorithms for watering and fertilizing

Important bug fix for custom tasks!

Version before:
A lot!
- Light meter!
Not sure how intense the light is in your room, and if your plant is really suitable there? The light meter will automatically let you know!

- Custom tasks
Did you give your plant water outside of the schedule? We made it super easy to track this with a big + button on each plant

- Pictures
One of the best things about plants is that they grow! Right? And when they do, snap a picture, upload it to Planta and build a diary of your plants growth progress

-Updated history design
Past endeavors should be visible! We changed the design of your plants history to easier get a grasp of what you’ve done or browse through your added pictures. 

- Improvements on the care algorithms for watering and fertilizing
Undo completed tasks - great to have if you accidentally completed a task and changed your mind
Undo completed tasks - great to have if you accidentally completed a task and changed your mind

- Support for sign in with Apple
- Support for different types of pots, terracotta, plastic, glass etc, that will adjust the watering schedule
- Photos taken with the plant scanner will now be saved as main plant picture
- A lot of fixes

Fixes for sign in with Apple and pots

Version before:
- Support for sign in with Apple
- Support for different types of pots, terracotta, plastic, glass etc, that will adjust the watering schedule
- Photos taken with the plant scanner will now be saved as main plant picture
- A lot of fixes
We spent the last month fixing things all over the app. This version will for example make notifications more stable and we also have a surprise for our premium users, let’s see if you’ll find it!

We spent the last month fixing things all over the app. 
- Fixed stability of push notifications (reminders)
- You can now choose what time you want reminders (push notifications) to arrive
- We also have a surprise for our premium users, let’s see if you’ll find it!

- We also have a surprise for our premium users, let’s see if you’ll find it!

- You can now choose what time you want reminders (push notifications) to arrive
- We also have a surprise for our premium users, let’s see if you’ll find it!

You can now search among your plants in the My plants section. And if you like, sort them after site, name or most urgent tasks.

We have also built a new feature! Plant Progress! This will let you track the health of your plant, follow growth progress and make sure all of your plants are as healthy as possible!

We hope you will like it!

Bug fixes!

- Dr. Planta version 2 is here! Dr Planta will now provide you with full treatment plans in the app making it easier for you to treat your sick plants
- You can also manually add your own Symptom and Diagnosis for poorly plants
- Statistics regarding how good you care for your plants is available (find it by tapping on the ”water/fertilize” button on each plant)
- Uploading pictures is now much faster on slow connections

Bug fixes

Bug fixes and improvements of todo list

Version before:
A brand new update is here, and this is a good one where we added a lot of your requests!

- The todo tab has been improved with an updated design and a lot of new functionality
- Easier and quicker overview of your tasks - to see what needs to be done as soon as you open the app
- Delayed tasks are now marked and showing you with how many days
- Possibility to skip multiple tasks at once
- Snoozed tasks are now visible on the plants history log

Live weather!
- Planta will use the current weather on your location to set the perfect schedule, for example if a heat wave is coming the watering schedule will take that into account

For Planta Premium users:
- Get weather alerts and warnings when it is too hot, too cold, a storm is coming, heavy rain, low amount of sunlight - whenever your plants might need extra care
- Get notified when it has rained on your location and easy mark all plants in a site as watered when it has rained
